tool_description: Simple use temp mail api more than 50 domains. Fast response and cheap. Messages not delete in one year if you don't want.
name: Fast Temp Mail
title: Fast Temp Mail

api_list.name: Get Mail Box
api_list.description: This endpoint will return given email address mail box messages.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mail/example@domain.com/messages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mail/{mail}/messages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Domains
api_list.description: This endpoint will returns more than 20 new domains every request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com/v1/mail/domains"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-temp-mail.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
